HELLO: Hey, I'm so glad you set EstherBot up! Do you want to tell Esther that you're talking to her bot? %[Tell her](postback:twitter)
TELL HER: Let's tweet @ Esther so she knows you're setting a bot up. Here's a tweet that's ready to go: %[Tweet Esther](http://bit.ly/estherbot-tweet)
I LOVE YOU: Awh, shucks! I love you too!
BAT01CE601:
KKS: BAT01CE601
TEXT: BUCHOLZ MAIN TRANSF
STATUS: ALARM
REASON: Main transformer Bucholz Relay activated
ACTION: Contact the protection department and/or ABB
BAT01CT001:
#BAT01CT001#_#WINDING TEMPERATURE#_#> HIGH#
#Main transformer winding temperature supervision, stage1, has activated#
BAT01CT003:
#BAT01CT003#_#OIL TEMPERATURE#_#> HIGH#
#Main transformer oil temperature oil temperature supervision, stage 1, has activated.#
BAT01EG803:
#BAT01EG803#_#TRANSFORMER COOLING#_#FAULT#
#One or more of the six cooling fans are not in operation#
BFA00EA804:
#BFA00EA804#_#0.4kV UNIT BD BFA04#_#DIST#
#Over-current protection in one of the breaker modules of BFA04 has activated (white disturbance lamp on)#
BFA00EA805:
#BFA00EA805#_#0.4kV UNIT BD BFA04#_#LCINT#
#One of the breaker modules is racked out or in test position#
BFA00GS501:
#BFA00GS501#_#0.4kV RECLOSG DEVICE#_#FAULT#
#Auxiliary voltage for re-closing system missing#

#BFA00GS501#_#0.4kV UNIT BOARD BFA04#_#UVOLT#
#Under-voltage in BFA panel#

#BFA00GS501#_#0.4kV CONTROL VOLTAGE#_#< MIN#
#Control voltage for re-closing device is low#
BFT01CE601:
#BFT01CE601#_#BUCHOLZ AUX TRANSF#_#ALARM#
#Auxiliary transformer Bucholz Relay has activated#
BFT01CL001:
#BFT01CL001#_#TRANSF OIL LEVEL#_#< LOW#
#Oil level in aux. transformer is low#
BFT01CT001:
#BFT01CT001#_#OIL TEMPERATURE#_#> HIGH#
#Auxiliary transformer oil temperature oil temperature supervision has activated#
BPA00EA100:
#BPA00EA100#_#PROTECTION CRITERIA#_#ACTIVAT#
#Emergency off-order for starting device due to: FG starting equipment ON and Lube oil (or) pressure< 60% for more than 3 sec (or) Fire protection activated (or) Bearing metal temperature > max trip (or) Starting equipment failure (or) Generator transformer protection activated (or) Excitation equipment disturbed#
BPA00EA801:
#BPA00EA801#_#STARTING EQUIPMENT#_#DIST#
#Disturbance of starting device with low voltage power supply (BFA, 380Vac) not in under-voltage condition at the same time for more than 10seconds#
BPA00EA802:
#BPA00EA802#_#START MAIN BREAKER#_#DIST#
#Earth fault on 2.15 kV system (or) Fault of starting main breaker BBA00GS201 (or) Fault of control voltage#

#BPA00EA803#_#START MAIN BREAKER#_#LCINT#
#Operating selection switch of starting main breaker is set to 'local' position#
BPA00EA804:
#BPA00EA804#_#START SELEC BOARD#_#FAULT#
#Fault on selection isolators BCA00GS***#
BPA01EG801:
#BPA01EG801#_#STARTING EQUIPMENT#_#WARN#
#Collective alarm indication from starting device#

#DC fault detection of batter charger activated#

BTN00EG801:

#CEA01EG803#_#OIL LEVEL TRANSFORMER BAT01#_#< LOW#
